text: Edwin Stevens may refer to: * Edwin Stevens (missionary) (1802–1837), American protestant missionary in China * Arthur Edwin Stevens (1905–1995), Welsh inventor who designed the world's first wearable electronic hearing aid * Edwin A. Stevens (1794–1868), American inventor and entrepreneur * Edwin A. Stevens Jr. (1858–1918), American soldier, engineer and architect ==See also== * Edwin A. Stevens Hall (built in 1870) in USA * Edwin S. Lines (1845–1927), American clergyman, bishop of Newark
title: Edwin Stevens
